name: Bit's Adventure (Demo)
description:
Bit's Adventure is a platformer game where you control Bit, a robot created by the professor Psyosix. It was created in order to collect 'lighties', the main resource from earth that is dissapearing, and redistribute it equally between everyone.  

Enemies that want to get this lighties will face Bit in its adventure! Defeat them with your powerful tail attack and your empowered jump! Collect the maximum quantity of lighties that you can while you play the stages! 

This game is  created with Unity, by itZekken.  It is a demo/alpha, as it is in a development phase.
